name: Staff of Healing
description: A staff infused with healing powers, capable of restoring health to the wounded.
looks: The staff is made of polished maple wood, with intricate carvings of leaves and vines. It has a crystal orb at the top, emitting a gentle, calming light.

special_effects.healing_aura: Provides a constant aura of healing that regenerates nearby allies' health.

name: Staff of Healing
description: A magical staff that radiates healing energy.
looks: The staff is made of polished maple wood and has a crystal orb at the top. The orb glows with a soothing white light.

special_effects.healing_aura: Emits a healing aura that restores the health of nearby allies.

name: Steel Shield
description: A sturdy shield made of steel.
looks: The shield is round in shape and made of solid steel. It has a simple design with a smooth surface and a handle on the back.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

name: Staff of the Elements
description: A powerful staff that harnesses the power of the elements.
looks: The staff is made of a polished ebony wood and features intricate carvings of the elements - fire, water, air, earth, and lightning.

special_effects.elemental_blast: Has a chance to unleash a powerful blast of elemental energy upon successful hit.

name: Enchanted Shield
description: A magical shield infused with protective enchantments.
looks: The shield is made of shining silver with intricate designs etched into its surface. It is adorned with glowing runes and has a gemstone in the center.

special_effects.elemental_resistance: Provides resistance against all elemental damage.

name: Staff of Healing
description: A magical staff that channels healing energy.
looks: The staff is made of polished oak and adorned with intricate carvings of healing symbols. It glows with a soft golden light.

special_effects.healing_touch: Increases the effectiveness of healing spells.

name: Staff of the Elements
description: A powerful staff that harnesses the power of the elements.
looks: The staff is made of a dark wood and adorned with gems representing the different elements. It crackles with energy.

special_effects.elemental_mastery: Increase the damage of elemental spells by 25%.
